entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McPherson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McPherson Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 70 %

Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
